data.eml:eml: The black coral fauna (Cnidaria: Antipatharia) of Bermuda with new records

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wagner, Daniel, Shuler, Andrew (2017): The black coral fauna (Cnidaria: Antipatharia) of Bermuda with new records. Zootaxa 4344 (2): 367-379, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4344.2.11
